title: Missing my riot skins?
body: I had Riot Graves and Riot K9 Nasus but i dont have them anymore??? I still have my Arcade Hecarim and Full Metal Rammus.

replies.body: I can still see Riot Graves on your account as well as Riot Blitz, but I'm not actually seeing that this account has *ever* owned K9 Nasus. Double check for those two skins in your collection, and let me know if you might have had K9 Nasus on a different account maybe?

I remember having it long ago before i quit about the time Braum came out, and i think someone hacked my account because when i came back i had every champion and camille was coming out. But yes i do remember playing with that skin. A different account?? if its not on ahem.....ABigFlamingDildo..... i dont remember playing on my friends acc when i went to his house but his tag is skyraidgod.
Also my riot blitzcrank is gone too
